text: Thank-you for this, I was referring to userId as context.user.userId...:flushed:

So that is working now, thank-you. However i've got a new problem...
The value I retrieve from user.Id is not the same value used to set a HubSpot user-based property, so it's failing validation. The ID held on the HubSpot user property (internal reference) is completely different?

Is there a way to access this easily via context.user.whatisthatidnumber?

Sorry to confirm, a few other issues but the user.id issue was my first hurdle and the rest is now working as expected. thanks so much for your help!
Using the owner endpoint to get ownerid
I’m having this same issue. My guess was that we had synced the sandbox with our prod account so the mapping of user ids was off. That’s just a theory and I haven’t validated it in any way.
